attributes.action: Continue providing free LFTs after 1st April 2022
attributes.additional_details:
Free LFTs allow people to safely attend events, distinguish between Covid-19 and other viruses, and detect Covid-19 when they are asymptomatic.

Charging for these will reduce testing, leading to more transmission and higher Covid-19 rates. This puts everyone at risk - and if testing isn’t widespread, providing free LFTs to at-risk groups does not make it less likely they’ll be exposed to Covid-19. This will disproportionately impact lower-income families, with living costs already skyrocketing.
attributes.background:
Under current proposals, free Lateral Flow Tests (LFTs) are due to be scrapped in England from 1st April 2022. They will be replaced with paid-for tests.

There are currently ~45k new Covid-19 cases reported each day: on-par with previous peaks. Covid-19 is still a threat to the UK population.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Continue providing Lateral Flow / Self Test Kits free by post and at pharmacies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593320
